propDescriptions.classes: Override or extend the styles applied to the component. See CSS API below for more details.
propDescriptions.color: The color of the component. It supports those theme colors that make sense for this component.
propDescriptions.component: The component used for the root node. Either a string to use a HTML element or a component.
propDescriptions.disableFocusRipple: If true, the keyboard focus ripple is disabled.
propDescriptions.disableRipple:
If true, the ripple effect is disabled.
⚠️ Without a ripple there is no styling for :focus-visible by default. Be sure to highlight the element by applying separate styles with the focusVisibleClassName.
propDescriptions.fullWidth: If true, the button will take up the full width of its container.
propDescriptions.href: The URL to link to when the button is clicked. If defined, an a element will be used as the root node.
propDescriptions.size: The size of the button. small is equivalent to the dense button styling.

root.description: Styles applied to the root element.

label.description: Styles applied to the span element that wraps the children.

text.description: Styles applied to the root element if {{conditions}}.

textPrimary.description: Styles applied to the root element if {{conditions}}.

textSecondary.description: Styles applied to the root element if {{conditions}}.

outlined.description: Styles applied to the root element if {{conditions}}.

outlinedPrimary.description: Styles applied to the root element if {{conditions}}.

outlinedSecondary.description: Styles applied to the root element if {{conditions}}.

contained.description: Styles applied to the root element if {{conditions}}.

containedPrimary.description: Styles applied to the root element if {{conditions}}.

containedSecondary.description: Styles applied to the root element if {{conditions}}.

disableElevation.description: Styles applied to the root element if {{conditions}}.

focusVisible.description: Pseudo-class applied to the ButtonBase root element if the button is keyboard focused.

disabled.description: Pseudo-class applied to the root element if {{conditions}}.

colorInherit.description: Styles applied to the root element if {{conditions}}.

textSizeSmall.description: Styles applied to the root element if {{conditions}}.

textSizeLarge.description: Styles applied to the root element if {{conditions}}.

outlinedSizeSmall.description: Styles applied to the root element if {{conditions}}.

outlinedSizeLarge.description: Styles applied to the root element if {{conditions}}.

containedSizeSmall.description: Styles applied to the root element if {{conditions}}.

containedSizeLarge.description: Styles applied to the root element if {{conditions}}.

sizeSmall.description: Styles applied to the root element if {{conditions}}.

sizeLarge.description: Styles applied to the root element if {{conditions}}.

fullWidth.description: Styles applied to the root element if {{conditions}}.

startIcon.description: Styles applied to the startIcon element if supplied.

endIcon.description: Styles applied to the endIcon element if supplied.

iconSizeSmall.description: Styles applied to the icon element if supplied and `size="small"`.

iconSizeMedium.description: Styles applied to the icon element if supplied and `size="medium"`.

iconSizeLarge.description: Styles applied to the icon element if supplied and `size="large"`.
